title: Forever Authenticating?
body: Was chilling in the client this morning, scrolling through my champions picking out who to level mastery on today, when the client kicked me saying it couldn't connect to the server. "No big deal, I'll just restart the client." Fast forward a few hours and I'm still trying to log in with the login screen telling me it's authenticating. Restarted my computer, did some updates, full system scan, even ran the hextech repair tool a couple times to fix it. At one point I was able to connect for maybe 5 minutes, but then it kicked me back out and I'm forever authenticating again. Is this just some weird bug that's plaguing the client, or is it something greater?

replies.body: Failing to reach the authentication server can result from a connection issue.  A repair wouldn't really resolve this, but we can look for factors like blocks caused by firewalls and antivirus.  I recommend running through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to really know for sure.  I hope that helps!
